name: City of Music(Turn your music into games)
name_original: City of Music(Turn your music into games)
description:
Turn your music into games!
One click to lead in all the songs in your iPhone and turn them into relaxing beats.
Move your fingers with familiar melody, and challenge higher scores.
The difficulty level can be controlled in any songs, choose the one that suits you well and try higher ones.
Share with your friends if you like it, see what songs they are listening to.
Download some music from iTunes ,have fun.
